attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People please… I watch the BBC (as we all do) hoping for an “unbiased” view of “British” society and political opinion.

It blatantly is not.

It’s the “Nirvana” like society that the left wing socialist dreamers want.

We, the public, have got to stop this socio/communistic propaganda that is been forced on us… and give us ALL the freedom of speech. Is that not DEMOCRACY! 

We must have a system where political influence within the BBC is outlawed, because the current system is blatantly abused. 

I ask the current socialist govenment to respond and remove any political influence.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
